+++Cledar Forrior Rixer Truttle Blyer Mist Cinder Aqua Rubble Mantle 
Cyndro+++

Cledar ducked under a whole bunch of shots, and nearly got his head sliced 
off by a blade, but he was ok. He jumped back up and fired his fusion cannon 
at Motormaster. This time, though, he was aiming for Motormaster's feet, so 
even if he missed the explosion from the cannon would do some damage.


Forrior rolled and a few missiles flew by above his head. He got up and saw 
a fusion blast just like ones that he could fire stream off toward the 
Element. Forrior turned and saw Megatron, and his eyes narrowed.

Forrior rode off toward Megatron, firing his fusion cannon at Megatron's 
feet. He was using the same tactic that Cledar was.


Rixer ducked under a whole bunched of optic shots though a few hit him in 
the back and made him stumble out of the way of a missle. He looked back and 
saw Imprisoner. Rixer turned around and fired two missiles and twenty shots 
at Imprisoner, and then jogged toward him.


Truttle was hit by a few shots but they did pretty much nothing to his 
armor. He looked up and saw Shockwave, and then flew up into the air. He 
aimed both his guns carefully and fired twenty shots from each, spreading 
them out so that Shockwave wouldn't be able to dodge.


Blyer saw Firestorm fire two missiles at the Element and would have frowned 
if he wasn't in jet mode. It was pretty stupid for even a large faction to 
attack a base, but Predacons were always stupid. He flew down toward 
Firearm, and fired two missiles and then followed up with almost twenty 
plasma shots.


Mist flew upwards and saw two enemy bots talking. She looked at her charge 
launcher and then at the two bots, and then saw that a Maximal was already 
flying toward them. But he would probably need help though, so she aimed her 
charge launcher and fired two charges at Wildrider.


Cinder dodged a few shots from Rippersnapper but then saw that he was 
fighting someone else now. She looked around for someone to fire at and 
spotted Choran. Cinder took careful aim with her plasma pistol and fired 
four shots at him.


Aqua loocked around to pick out any bots that he could fire at and then saw 
Sun Crusher firing at the Element. He shook his head, wondering why that bot 
even bothered doing something so stupid, and then fired two spears at Sun 
Crusher and ran toward him


Rubble ran toward the Element because he had spotted another bot firing on 
it. He lifted his missile launchers and fired two missiles from each one at 
Sixshot.


Mantle stood up and looked at Epyon after looking at various reports and 
seeing that the Cybertronian Fire was about a forth dissassembled. The 
shield generators and the outer armor would go last, but right now almost 
all of the computer technology had been taken out. The nano bots were 
running the shield generators by themselves since they could pass on 
commands just like a normal computer.

"Lets go back to the battle. Cyndro will take care of the city, but our 
fellow Maximals need us." After he said that he walked off down the hallway, 
but turned around to see if Epyon was coming.


Some missiles and laser shots were hitting the Element's shields, but Cyndro 
wasn't worried at all. These bots were very weak. The strongest attack had 
come from some big plasma blasts, but Cyndro could detect many such blasts 
coming from the Maximal side as well. How the Cybertronian Fire had ever 
gotten to the bad condition that it was in, Cyndro could only guess. He was 
happy with how well his nanobots were doing, but he was annoyed at everyone 
firing at him. The shields still had quite a bit to go before even beginning 
to lower, and there would be extra power from the Cybertronian Fire long 
before that.

Cyndro aimed the Element's weapons and fired two missiles at each robot that 
had fired at him, and then shot plasma blasts at the nearest few. The 
nearest were Shockwave, Sixshot, and Sun Crusher.
